body_html:
@shamoya , I am wondering if your hang is caused by a corrupted message due to a multi-thread race condition. Let's say an Ack is corrupted, hence not parsed properly, then the remote buffer is not released. as a result, no more message can be sent. I describe the messaging system in detail here in case you did not know already.

If you see multiple lines like remote_status_ is not idle, there is a good chance the messaging system is screwed up.
body_text:
@shamoya , I am wondering if your hang is caused by a corrupted message due to a multi-thread race condition. Let's say an Ack is corrupted, hence not parsed properly, then the remote buffer is not released. as a result, no more message can be sent. I describe the messaging system in detail here in case you did not know already.
If you see multiple lines like remote_status_ is not idle, there is a good chance the messaging system is screwed up.
body:
@shamoya , I am wondering if your hang is caused by a corrupted message due to a multi-thread race condition. Let's say an Ack is corrupted, hence not parsed properly, then the remote buffer is not released. as a result, no more message can be sent. I describe the messaging system in detail [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/11416) in case you did not know already.

If you see multiple lines like `remote_status_ is not idle`, there is a good chance the messaging system is screwed up.
